name: eLiteERP
tag_list: windows-based-erp-for-small-businesses, cost-effective-erp, erp-for-small--mid-sized-enterprises, erp-for-manufacturing, erp-for-trading, erp-for-retail, erp-software-ahmedabad
description: eLiteERP is a Cost Effective Windows bas
overview: eLiteERP is a smart windows based ERP solution primarily designed for Micro and Small enterprises looking for a cost effective solution which can enable them to quickly move away from current manual processes to a fully integrated business solution. The easy-to-use and operate ERP solution can be up and running in two weeks flat and requires very little training and support. The highly configurable ERP solution covers all the modules like Financial Accounting, Sales and Distribution, Procurement, Inventory Management and Manufacturing which any small organization requires. eLiteERP also includes a module on compliance management that can give you VAT, TDS, EXCISE and Export reports in print friendly PDF formats.
